question: List all lobbies or terraces that can accomodate 500 people.
sql_query1:
SELECT Room.Name 
FROM Room
WHERE (Room.Indoor_Outdoor_Space = "Lobby" OR Room.Indoor_Outdoor_Space = "Terrace") AND Room.Size = 500
sql_query2:
SELECT Room.Name 
FROM Room
WHERE Room.Indoor_Outdoor_Space = "Lobby" OR Room.Indoor_Outdoor_Space = "Terrace" AND Room.Size = 500
interpretation1: List all lobbies that can accommodate 500 people and terraces of the same size.
interpretation2: Show all lobbies and also show all terraces that can accommodate 500 people.
